document_data.name: Bert Adams
document_data.mainbody: '''Bert "The Weasel" Adams''' was a [[red cap]] boatswain of the [[Blushing Mermaid]] in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the time [[Captain Grisly]] was replaced by the [[green hag]] [[Auntie Ethel]] as the owner of Blushing Mermaid, Bert resided at the Mermaid, alongside other hag's crewmen, spending their days drinking and partying. Bert was masquerading as a human sailor, keeping his [[fey]] nature a secret. It was unclear if the Bert "The Weasel" Adams identity was stolen from a slain sailor or was a fabrication.
